metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition
metadata.section_title: Masonry and Insulating Concrete Form Walls Not In Contact with the Ground

requirements.description: This Section applies to unreinforced masonry and masonry veneer walls not in contact with the ground where the height does not exceed 11 m and the roof or floor assembly above the first storey is not of concrete construction
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to unreinforced masonry and masonry veneer walls not in contact with the ground, where the height of the walls constructed on the foundation walls does not exceed 11 m, and the roof or floor assembly above the first storey is not of concrete construction

requirements.description: This Section applies to insulating concrete form walls not in contact with the ground conforming to CAN/ULC-S717
requirements.exact_quote: insulating concrete form walls not in contact with the ground conforming to CAN/ULC-S717

requirements.description: In locations where spectral acceleration Sa(0.2) is greater than 0.55, load bearing masonry elements more than 1 storey shall be reinforced per Subsection 9.20.15
requirements.exact_quote: In locations where the spectral acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.55, load bearing elements of masonry buildings more than 1 storey in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement required by Subsection 9.20.15

requirements.description: In locations where spectral acceleration Sa(0.2) is greater than 0.35 but less than or equal to 0.55, masonry buildings 3 storeys shall be reinforced per Subsection 9.20.15
requirements.exact_quote: In locations where the spectral acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.35 but less than or equal to 0.55, load bearing elements of masonry buildings 3 storeys in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement required by Subsection 9.20.15

requirements.description: Masonry units shall conform to applicable CSA standards including A165.1, A82, A8
requirements.exact_quote: Masonry units shall conform to CSA A165.1, CSA A82, CSA A8
requirements.standard_reference: CSA A165.1, CSA A82, CSA A8

requirements.description: Used brick shall not be used as masonry veneer
requirements.exact_quote: Used brick shall not be used as masonry veneer

requirements.description: Glass block panels used as exterior non-load bearing walls shall have areas not exceeding 13.5 m2
requirements.exact_quote: Glass block panels used as exterior non-load bearing walls shall have areas not exceeding 13.5 m2

articles.title: Concrete Blocks Exposed to the Weather

requirements.description: Compressive strength of masonry shall conform to Table 9.20.2.7
requirements.exact_quote: The compressive strength of masonry shall conform to Table 9.20.2.7

requirements.description: Mortar materials shall conform to CSA A179
requirements.exact_quote: Mortar materials shall conform to CSA A179

requirements.description: Unless otherwise specified, mortar shall be Type N for masonry walls
requirements.exact_quote: Unless otherwise specified, mortar shall be Type N for masonry walls

requirements.description: Grout materials shall conform to CSA A179
requirements.exact_quote: Grout materials shall conform to CSA A179

requirements.description: Minimum wall thickness for masonry walls shall be 140 mm for solid masonry and 190 mm for hollow masonry
requirements.exact_quote: Minimum wall thickness for masonry walls shall be 140 mm for solid masonry and 190 mm for hollow masonry

requirements.description: Lintels shall be provided over all openings in masonry walls and shall have minimum bearing of 100 mm at each end
requirements.exact_quote: Lintels shall be provided over all openings in masonry walls and shall have minimum bearing of 100 mm at each end

requirements.description: Unreinforced masonry parapets shall not exceed 600 mm in height
requirements.exact_quote: Unreinforced masonry parapets shall not exceed 600 mm in height

requirements.description: Masonry veneer shall be applied to wood frame, steel frame, or masonry backing
requirements.exact_quote: Masonry veneer shall be applied to wood frame, steel frame, or masonry backing

articles.title: Chases or Recesses Cut into Walls

requirements.description: Masonry veneer ties shall be spaced not more than 800 mm horizontally and 600 mm vertically
requirements.exact_quote: Masonry veneer ties shall be spaced not more than 800 mm horizontally and 600 mm vertically

articles.title: Projection of Masonry Veneer Beyond Supporting Members
Joints to be Offset or Reinforced

requirements.description: Flashing shall be installed at the base of masonry veneer walls, at shelf angles, lintels, and at other locations where moisture may accumulate
requirements.exact_quote: Flashing shall be installed at the base of masonry veneer walls, at shelf angles, lintels, and at other locations where moisture may accumulate

articles.title: Bonding or Tying of Other than Masonry Veneer

requirements.description: Weep holes shall be provided at horizontal spacing not exceeding 800 mm
requirements.exact_quote: Weep holes shall be provided at horizontal spacing not exceeding 800 mm

articles.title: Anchorage to Floor or Roof Assemblies where Masonry Walls Require

requirements.description: Expansion joints in clay brick masonry shall be provided at intervals not exceeding 15 m
requirements.exact_quote: Expansion joints in clay brick masonry shall be provided at intervals not exceeding 15 m

Anchoring Intersecting Wood-Frame Walls to Masonry Walls
Anchoring Wood-Frame Roof Systems to Masonry Walls

requirements.description: Control joints in concrete masonry shall be provided at intervals not exceeding 6 m
requirements.exact_quote: Control joints in concrete masonry shall be provided at intervals not exceeding 6 m

requirements.description: Insulating concrete form walls shall conform to CAN/ULC-S717
requirements.exact_quote: Insulating concrete form walls shall conform to CAN/ULC-S717

requirements.description: Minimum concrete core thickness for ICF walls shall be 140 mm
requirements.exact_quote: Minimum concrete core thickness for ICF walls shall be 140 mm

requirements.description: Reinforced masonry shall have minimum reinforcement in accordance with this Subsection
requirements.exact_quote: Reinforced masonry shall have minimum reinforcement in accordance with this Subsection
